connectionMenu.title: CONNECT TO ARCHIPELAGO
connectionMenu.connectionIssue:
Failed to connect to Archipelago host.
Make sure the address, port, slot name and password are correct.
connectionMenu.roomIdConflict:
The room ID has changed since the last time you connected with this save.
Are you <c=card>absolutely</c> sure you are connecting to the right address/port?
connectionMenu.slotDataInvalid:
The slot data sent by the server could not be parsed.
Are you using the right version of the mod and APWorld?

settings.profileWarning:
<c=redd>THIS MOD DOES NOT SUPPORT PROFILES!
SETTINGS ARE SAVED PER-SLOT.</c>

deathlink.desc: How deathlink is applied to your game. Cobalt Core runs can be pretty long, so make sure to pick the setting that suits you best.
deathlink.descMissing:
<c=card>Missing!:</c> if another player dies, one of your character goes missing. If you die, other players die as well.
Good if other players die frequently.
deathlink.descHullDamage:
<c=card>Hull damage:</c> if another player dies, you will lose some hull. If you die, other players die as well.
Good if other players die a normal amount.
deathlink.descDeath:
<c=card>Die:</c> if another player dies, you die. If you die, other players die as well.
Good if other players die rarely.

deathlinkHullDamage.desc: How much hull you will lose when you receive a deathlink from another player.

automaticScouting.desc: What happens when you see an archipelago card or artifact reward.
automaticScouting.descDontScout: <c=card>Don't scout:</c> cards & artifacts will <c=attack>not</c> show which item they will give.
automaticScouting.descScoutOnly: <c=card>Scout silently:</c> cards & artifacts show which item they will give.
automaticScouting.descCreateHint: <c=card>Create hint:</c> cards & artifacts show which item they will give, create a hint for it, and message all players.

bypassDifficulty.desc: Check to ignore the minimum difficulty setting in your YAML options, if you changed your mind for example.

messagesInMenu.desc: See the Archipelago console in the main menu.

mainMenu.welcomeMessage:
<c=card>Welcome to Archipelago!
Don't forget to take a look at your <c=redd>Mod Settings</c> to setup options such as <c=redd>deathlink</c> and <c=redd>hint messages</c>!</c>
mainMenu.debugModeWarning: <c=redd>WARNING:</c> Debug mode is active, which can interfere with text input. Please deactivate debug mode in <c=card>Nickel's Mod Settings</c> to input commands.

newRunOptions.shipUnlock: You haven't unlocked this ship yet!
newRunOptions.charUnlock: You haven't unlocked this character yet!

AArchipelagoCheckLocation.title: AP Item
AArchipelagoCheckLocation.desc: Send an <c=boldPink>Archipelago</c> item to someone in the multiworld.

CheckLocationCard.name: Archipelago Item!
CheckLocationCard.descSelfAddCard: Unlock <c=card>{0}</c> and add it to your hand.

CheckLocationArtifact.name: ARCHIPELAGO ITEM!
CheckLocationArtifact.descSelfAddCard: Unlock <c=card>{0}</c> and add it to your deck.

LockedArtifact.name: LOCKED ARTIFACT
LockedArtifact.desc: You haven't unlocked this artifact yet.
LockedArtifact.descNotFound: No underlying artifact! <c=attack>This should not happen!</c>
